SPOTLIGHT As National Small Business Month comes to a close, have you taken time to rate the success of your consultancy? At MBO Partners, our mission is to help independent consultants and their clients get to work, so we have a special interest in promoting successful consultants. Watch our short video <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-we-help> to learn about how MBO can help you. Whether it's taxes, expenses, insurance, or a lack of business support, MBO is always publishing new educational content and tools to help you overcome the challenges of independent consulting.
Gene Zaino Founder and CEO Connect with Gene <http://www.linkedin.com/in/genezaino>
HOW TO TRANSITION FROM TRADITIONAL W-2 EMPLOYMENT TO INDEPENDENT CONSULTING There has never been a better time to become an independent consultant. In fact, nearly 17 million U.S. workers have embarked upon the path to date. It is a heady time in the U.S. workforce landscape, with many options for pursuing your passion. We know from the MBO Partners Independent Workforce Index, the first-ever study of independent professionals in America, that the cataclysmic workforce shifts of the past decades have fueled a new kind of productivity, wealth and personal growth opportunity for American workers and companies. We also know that the majority of those who chose the independent path are very satisfied and plan to continue working as an independent. Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners 703-793-6281 ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mail to:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Nicolette Taylor, a consultant services advisor for MBO Partners, tells the story of a consultant who tried many career paths – and ended up back at MBO.
“Our Client Referred Associates have to work through MBO at their Enterprise clients. When they are given the choice to use MBO on their next project, they can see the true value of our service. Not surprisingly, our Client Referred Associates can often end up becoming our biggest advocates.”
Read More <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/coming-around-again-mbo-alumnus%E2%80%99s-journey-back> MBO Q & A Q. How does MBO make it easier for me to work with a large client? A. If you have Fortune 1,000 enterprise firms as your clients, you will find it easier and more seamless to win projects if your client is aware you are set up in our program. Since 1986, MBO has been establishing working relationships with many prestigious organizations, including more than half of the top Fortune 50 companies. We make it easy for our consultants to leverage those relationships to find opportunities. Additionally, based on our 25+ year history, financial strength and extensive insurance coverage, we can qualify you as a vendor to work with large companies. If MBO already has an agreement in place with a client you're interested in consulting with, you can avoid the time and effort required to establish a direct vendor status.
